Dear All,

[GigsGigsCloud](http://www.gigsgigscloud.com) is division of [GigsGigs.com](http://www.gigsgigs.com) for Cloud Focus Solutions.

[GigsGigsCloud](http://www.gigsgigscloud.com) is launching new SSD KVM VPS Plan, Cloudlet K, price start from $3.8/month.

**Cloudlet K1** - 1 Core Processor (E5) - 512M Memory - 20G SAS Disk Storage - 500G Data Transfer - Monthly Fees : $3.8 /month - Yearly fees : $28 / year

[View More](http://www.gigsgigscloud.com/cloud-vps-kvm/)

**Cloudlet K2 ** - 2 Core Processor (E5) - 1024M Memory - 40G SAS Disk Storage - 1500 G Data Transfer - Monthly Fees : $6.8 /month - Yearly fees : $58 / year

[View More](http://www.gigsgigscloud.com/cloud-vps-kvm/)
